hero.drivingDigital: Driving Digital Evolution For Forward-Thinking Businesses
hero.subtitle: We engineer powerful digital ecosystems that connect brands with their audiences through innovative technology, strategic design, and results-driven development.

services.title: Our Services & Capabilities
services.subtitle: We deliver exceptional digital experiences through our comprehensive range of services.
services.ourServicesDescription: At Progress IT, we deliver comprehensive digital solutions tailored to your unique business needs. Our expert team combines technical expertise with creative innovation to help you achieve your digital goals.
services.ourServicesDetail: From building stunning websites to developing powerful applications, crafting engaging brand identities to implementing robust cybersecurity measures, we provide end-to-end services that drive results and create exceptional digital experiences.
services.completeServiceDescription: Each service is tailored to meet your specific needs, ensuring exceptional results that exceed expectations.
services.readyToStartDescription: Our team of experts is ready to help you achieve your goals. Let's discuss your project and create a solution that's perfect for your business.

industries.subtitle: Specialized digital solutions tailored to the unique challenges and opportunities of your industry
industries.financialDescription: Transforming financial institutions with cutting-edge technology solutions that enhance customer experience, streamline operations, and ensure regulatory compliance.
industries.realEstateDescription: Comprehensive digital marketing strategies for real estate professionals that drive leads, showcase properties, and build lasting client relationships.
industries.ecommerceDescription: Scalable e-commerce platforms and retail solutions that optimize inventory, enhance shopping experiences, and maximize conversion rates.
industries.blockchainDescription: Innovative blockchain applications and decentralized solutions that enhance security, transparency, and efficiency across various business operations.
industries.entertainmentDescription: Engaging digital platforms for entertainment and media companies that captivate audiences, optimize content delivery, and enhance monetization.
industries.readyToTransformDescription: Our team of experts is ready to help you navigate the digital landscape and leverage technology to achieve your business goals.

calculator.estimatorDescription: Instantly calculate the cost, timeline, and resource requirements for your next technology project with our advanced estimation tool.
calculator.defineProjectDescription: Select your project type, complexity level, and team size to start building your estimate.
calculator.selectFeaturesDescription: Choose from core, security, infrastructure, and advanced features to customize your project scope.
calculator.getDetailedEstimateDescription: Receive instant calculation of cost, timeline, team size, and annual maintenance requirements.
calculator.complexityDescription: Please choose complexity: 'Low' is like building a cardboard house for outdoor cats, 'Medium' is standard app development, and 'High' is implementing SpaceX rocket landing logic.
calculator.diyDescription: We appreciate that you are ready to make this project by yourself, but in case you need consultation feel free to book a call with our experts.
calculator.complexDescription: For projects of insane complexity, we recommend having a detailed conversation to understand your specific requirements better.
calculator.featurePackedDescription: Yes, we can build this thing, but maybe you need help to understand your project deeply and prioritize features.
calculator.goingSolo: Going solo on a complex project?
calculator.goingSoloDescription: That's ambitious! Are you sure you want to handle all these features without some guidance?
calculator.hardToBuild: It's hard to build a unicorn without a strong team. Feel free to book a call when you're ready.
calculator.selectProjectTypeFirst: Please select a project type first
calculator.estimateIncludes: This estimate includes development, testing, and deployment costs. Additional costs may apply based on specific requirements.

technologies.title: Technologies We Use
technologies.subtitle: We leverage cutting-edge technologies to build robust, scalable, and future-proof solutions.

showcase.title: Our Showcase
showcase.subtitle: Discover our most innovative and impactful projects.

portfolio.title: Our Work
portfolio.subtitle: PORTFOLIO
portfolio.description: Explore our diverse portfolio of digital solutions that have helped businesses transform and grow in the digital landscape.

contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your digital presence? Reach out and let's build something extraordinary.
contact.helpText: Our award-winning team has helped businesses of all sizes achieve digital excellence through custom solutions tailored to your specific needs.
contact.projectCalculatorDesc: Get an instant estimate for your project based on your requirements
contact.projectDetailsDesc: Tell us about your project needs and get a personalized quote
contact.scheduleCallDesc: Book a consultation with our experts to discuss your project in detail
